jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Role :Global Director (People-HR)

Work Location:Mumbai

Exp: 10+yrs

Role summary:

We are looking for an individual who can build our HR unit to help support our cients growing business. The individual will have two primary areas of responsibilities

(1) HR strategy and operations, (2) talent acquisition.


Responsibilities:

1. Working for an international startup/ small to medium d business in driving HR strategy, setting up HR policies, processes etc. from the scratch

2.Strong in working closely with C-level in driving decisions, manage stakeholders and independent

3. Previous experience in Fintech or other similar industries and working with international reporting managers / stakeholders

4. Previous experience in setting up India operations – from finding an office to setting up HR and Operational processes is a MUST


Requirements:

• Bachelor degree required, Human Resources, Business or equivalent preferred

• 10 to 15 years of relevant experience, with at least 5 years in HR leadership and strategic roles

• Full understanding of the way an organisation operates to meet its objectives

• Business acumen partnered with attention to the human element

• Experienced working with employees working from different culture and locations

• Performance coaching of the leadership team and encouraging skill growth

• Strategic and systems thinking

• Excellent organisational and attention to detail

• Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills

• Knowledge of data analysis and reporting

• Previous people management experience required
